keys: fractional expression of a rational number
expressão fracionária de um número racional
espressione frazionaria di un numero razionale
resource_data:

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_502</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_502</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Números reales. Aproximaciones</string>
            <string language="en">Real numbers. Approximations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reale Zahlen. Näherungswerte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vrais nombres. Approximations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Números reais. Aproximações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Numeri reali. Approssimazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πραγματικοί αριθμοί. Προσεγγίσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de número real. Se estudian los números decimales racionales e irracionales. También se estudian los intervalos de la recta real, los cáclulos aproximados con números decimales y los errores.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of real number. It studies rational and irrational decimal numbers, intervals on the real  line, approximate calculations with decimal numbers and errors.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">fracción generatriz</string>
            <string language="en">fractional expression of a rational number</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">decimales</string>
            <string language="en">decimals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">reales</string>
            <string language="en">real</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">errores</string>
            <string language="en">errors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">intervalos</string>
            <string language="en">intervals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der realen Zahl zu erklären. Sie 
studiert die rationalen und vernunftwidrigen dezimalen Zahlen, die 
Abstände auf der realen Zeile, die ungefähren Dezimalrechnungen 
Zahlen und die Fehler.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept du vrai nombre. Il étudie 
des nombres décimaux raisonnables et irrationnels, des intervalles 
sur la vraie ligne, des calculs approximatifs avec des nombres 
décimaux et des erreurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito do número real. Estuda números decimais racionais e
irrational, intervalos na linha real, cálculos aproximados com 
números decimais e erros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto del numero reale. Studia i numeri decimali 
razionali ed irrazionali, gli intervalli sulla riga reale, i calcoli 
approssimativi con i numeri decimali e gli errori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια του πραγματικού αριθμού. Μελετά 
τους λογικούς και άρρητους δεκαδικούς αριθμούς, τα διαστήματα 
στην πραγματική γραμμή, τους κατά προσέγγιση υπολογισμούς με τους
δεκαδικούς αριθμούς και τα σφάλματα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bruchausdruck einer rationalen Zahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dezimalstriche</string>
          </keyword>
